question: What is the theme of the ‘Financial Literacy Week 2021’?
option4: Credit Discipline and Credit from Formal Institutions
answer: Credit Discipline and Credit from Formal Institutions
explanation:
Reserve Bank of India leads the observance of the Financial Literacy Week since 2016, to create awareness about financial education.
This year, it is being observed from February 8-12, 2021, with the theme of 'Credit Discipline and Credit from Formal Institutions'. RBI is also conducting mass media campaigns in the month of February to promote financial awareness.
